item.title: Citigroup results exceed analysts' estimates on gains in fixed income and equities trading
item.description: CEO Jane Fraser said Tuesday that the bank was continuing to earn credibility with investors and that she remains focused on executing on her strategy...

item.title: Bank of America tops analysts' estimates on better-than-expected interest income, trading
item.description: Bank of America shares have sold off in recent weeks on concern that President Donald Trump's tariff policies could cause a recession.

item.title: Bunq, a neobank for 'digital nomads,' accelerates U.S. expansion effort as profit jumps 65%
item.description: Dutch digital bank Bunq said Tuesday that it's applied for a broker-dealer license, in an initial step toward securing a full banking license.

item.title: Goldman's earnings provide reasons to believe in the stock despite a blurry backdrop
item.description: We're reiterating our buy-equivalent rating on the investment bank.

item.title: Goldman Sachs tops estimates on boom in equities trading revenue
item.description: Goldman Sachs joins rivals JPMorgan Chase and Morgan Stanley in posting better-than-expected equities trading revenue.
